originalText.text: I cannot speak highly enough about Dr McMahon and this office. I feel so lucky to have found him and Kiambu. I have a very physically demanding job and can always count on McMahon Chiropractic to keep me feeling great and healthy. I have been a regular for a few months now and every time I have an adjustment or a session I walk out feeling 10 inches taller. I feel very safe and comfortable with Dr McMahon. Look no further for all of your chiropractic needs.  10/10

originalText.text: I have serious, back issues, suffer chronic pain. I see Dr. McMahon at least once a week, have been seeing him going on 4 years. Without his skills and care, I believe I would literally be unable to walk. Not only a  talented practitioner, a terrific guy. His office is run by a wonderful young woman. I can’t recommend this practice too highly.

originalText.text:
Great overall experience.
Dr McMahon was recommended to me by a friend and I am so grateful for this..
I had been experiencing ongoing shoulder and neck pain for almost 2 years. Having tried Accupuncture, massage, laser therapy all while taking pain meds and anti inflammatories with no relief,
I was at my wits end.
I called Dr McMahon's  office and was given an appointment the same day.
His front desk person Ari is a delight and very professional.
I was quite nervous about seeing a chiropractor but Dr McMahon put me at ease right away.
It has now been a month since my first session and I have had NO pain since. I can't thank Dr McMahon enough. His treatments have improved my quality of life so much , and I would recommend anyone that is in pain to see him right away. I wish I had gone to him sooner.

originalText.text: I came to Dr McMahon because I was waking up with a neck ache every morning and a couple of mornings with slight dizziness as well - and my nutritionist recommended that I get a chiropractic adjustment. I was surprised at how much better I felt after the first treatment - and I continue to feel better - and no more dizziness! I highly recommend Dr McMahon.

text.text: I came to Dr McMahon because I was waking up with a neck ache every morning and a couple of mornings with slight dizziness as well - and my nutritionist recommended that I get a chiropractic adjustment. I was surprised at how much better I felt after the first treatment - and I continue to feel better - and no more dizziness! I highly recommend Dr McMahon.

originalText.text: I was referred to Dr McMahon by a co-worker because of my chronic back pain complaints. From the time I stepped into his office I was greeted by his professional, warm & friendly receptionist Jackie. Dr Mcmahon is very knowledgeable, and very easy to speak with. That's a big deal for me, my sessions have been such a great relief for me so far, after my 1st session I felt much better, I look forward to my appointments. As an added bonus, the office is very clean and inviting...I highly recommend Dr McMahon Chriropractic if you're  seeking a good 1.
